title: [Tuts Plus] Beginning Testing in Symfony 2 Video Tutorial-KTR
description:
[Tuts Plus] Beginning Testing in Symfony 2 Video Tutorial-KTR


PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Andrew Perkins
RELEASE DATE..: 2014.11.26
RUNTIME......: 1.5 hours



About this course::

To continue our series of courses about the popular PHP framework, Symfony 2, this course will take you through all you need to know to get started with testing. We'll explore the basic concepts of functional and unit tests in the context of a Symfony 2 application with PHPUnit. Then we'll dive into some practical examples of testing in action.



Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Welcome
1.2Installing Symfony 2
1.3Installing PHPUnit


2.Basic Testing in Symfony
2.1Running PHPUnit Tests
2.2Writing a Unit Test
2.3Writing a Functional Test
2.4Other Useful Assertions


3.Symfony 2 Testing in Practice
3.1Traversing HTML Nodes
3.2Gathering HTML Content
3.3Adding HTML Content
3.4Selecting and Retrieving Form Data


4.Wrap Up
4.1Review and Wrap Up
